Package carbon.drawable.ripple

Almost complete RippleDrawable backport for ICS and Lollipop, with some additional methods for Marshmallow.

Package carbon.drawable.ripple Description

Almost complete RippleDrawable backport for ICS and Lollipop, with some additional methods for Marshmallow. The only thing which is missing is hardware animation code which relies on the rendering thread introduced in Lollipop.
